osvSchema.summary: subhamg/unique-username-generator: Polynomial regular expression used on uncontrolled data
osvSchema.details:
subhamg/unique-username-generator: Polynomial regular expression used on uncontrolled data

A regular expression that can require polynomial time to match may be vulnerable to denial-of-service attacks.
This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in subhamg/unique-username-generator version v1.1.0 by commit 9a947183d08ed8faa2b6ab31022a7b3510ae2dc9. For more details please see the references link.
